bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was reported in the Senate on February 11, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Fort Bayard National Historic Landmark Act - (Sec. 2) Designates the Fort Bayard Historic District in Grant County, New Mexico, as the Fort Bayard National Historic Landmark.(Sec. 3) Allows the Secretary of the Interior to enter into cooperative agreements with and provide assistance to public or private entities to protect historic resources at Fort Bayard and to provide educational and interpretive facilities and programs for the public. Prohibits the Secretary from entering into any agreements or providing assistance to any activities affecting Fort Bayard State Hospital without the concurrence of the State of New Mexico.(Sec. 4) Authorizes appropriations.
